node.title: Aussies bracing for Black Caps to 'fight and scrap' in T20 World Cup decider
node.alt: An Australian fielder looks to his right during a match against West Indies at the men's T20 World Cup.
node.description: Australia knows the challenge they will face from New Zealand in the men's T20 World Cup final, especially after the Black Caps knocked England out of the tournament in the semis.
node.content:
["Aaron Finch says Australia is bracing for New Zealand to \"fight and scrap\" in Monday morning's (AEDT) men's T20 World Cup final.", "Australia \u2014 who is chasing its first men's T20 World Cup title \u2014 take on the Black Caps in Dubai after completing an enthralling\u00a0run chase in its five-wicket\u00a0win over\u00a0Pakistan in their semi-final on Friday (AEDT).", "The Black Caps reached the final after seeing off a heavily favoured England outfit with a five-wicket victory a day earlier.", "Finch said Australia knew what to expect from the Black Caps.", "", "
Daryl\u00a0Mitchell's batting helped lead the Black Caps to a semi-final victory over England.(Reuters:\u00a0Hamad I Mohammed)
", "\"Any time you play New Zealand you know how great a contest it's going to be,\" Finch said.", "\"They're so disciplined in all three facets of their game.", "\"Their fielding is outstanding and they are a team you have to be on for all 40 overs if you're going to get over the line.", "\"They are really well led by Kane [Williamson]\u00a0and regardless of how they're going they seem to hang around for long enough in any kind of contest and wear you down.", "It has not been smooth sailing for Australia against the Black Caps\u00a0in recent times.", "The Black Caps won the last T20 series between the two sides 3-2 earlier this year, with Devon Conway and Martin Guptill proving devastating with the bat.", "Conway will be unavailable, having broken\u00a0his hand while punching his bat in frustration after being dismissed in the semi-final win over England.", "Despite Conway's absence, Finch said\u00a0Australia would still have to be at its\u00a0best to get past the Black Caps.", "\"Conway has been such a consistent player for them,\" he said.", "\"He plays spin really well through those middle overs so that will be a big loss.", "\"But they have a really good squad and whoever they bring in for that role will still be a really big challenge.\"", "AAP/ABC"]
